articles.author: CLAIR JOHNSON cjohnson@billingsgazette.com
articles.title: After some debate, Yellowstone County will continue leasing house to program for homeless teens
articles.description: Homeless youth in the Tumbleweed program will continue to have a place to live through a contract renewed on Tuesday by Yellowstone County.

articles.author: By SUSAN OLP solp@billingsgazette.com
articles.title: Red Sand projects represent trafficked victims who fall through the cracks
articles.description: The cracks in the sidewalk near Peaks to Plains Park at Montana State University Billings turned red Thursday.

articles.author: By SUSAN OLP solp@billingsgazette.com
articles.title: Homelessness up slightly in Montana, with biggest increase in Billings
articles.description: Homelessness is up slightly in Montana, according to a national report released Wednesday by the U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development, with Billings seeing the biggest increase in the state.

articles.author: Barry Glendenning
articles.title: Yearning for the samba-style tiki-taka approach of Tony Hibbert
articles.description: Sign up now ! Sign up now ! Sign up now ? Sign up now ! A cynic could conceivably argue that Everton are not having a great season. Under Ronald Koeman, the Merseyside club finished seventh and went on an expensive summer trolley dash. Supporters were buoyantâ€¦
